scripts.build: npm install && mkdir -p nodejs && mv node_modules nodejs/node_modules && zip -r common-layer.zip nodejs && rm -rf nodejs
scripts.publish: aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name common --zip-file fileb://common-layer.zip --content S3Bucket=com-github-mstream-kingdoms,S3Key=common-layer.zip --compatible-runtimes nodejs12.x
